Kinda takes the sport out of it doesn't it?  LOL.  Hmmm...I think I'll stick to our Christmas Turkey
Just the way my hillbilly cousins, over Gooderham way, did it 30 years ago on Glamor Lake!

Hey its not just china.... dont for a minute think that that doesnt go on around here either !!!! in  northern ontario it goes on alot more than people think.  ..i have had MNR officers tell me that...but most people use the excuss that they are blowing up a beaver dam !!! well they blow up fish all the time...M y old next door nieghbor used to work for the CN railroad.....as a repair crew captain....and he told me way up northern ontario hundreds of miles in the middle of nowhere THEY USED TO DYNAMITE FISH ALL THE TIME!!!!!!   they always had fresh fish....imagine that....something to think about isnt it.....dam   makes me mad just thinking about it....grrrrrrrr
I know a guy in Alabama who resorts to this method once he has driven all over Alabama lokking for shiners that are no where to be found
